publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3686 Jamie Hepburn: 20th Anniversary of Cumbernauld Action Care for the Elderly—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld Action Care for the Elderly (CACE) on reaching its 20th anniversary in 2009; recognises the important work that the organisation has carried out over the last two decades, supporting and encouraging the senior citizens of Cumbernauld to make the most of their later years; notes that official celebrations will mark the anniversary on 21 April in Cumbernauld Town Hall, and looks forward to many more years of dedicated service to the older people of Cumbernauld from CACE.

S3M-3686 20th Anniversary of Cumbernauld Action Care for the Elderly (lodged on 11 March 2009) Cathie Craigie*, Alasdair Allan*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Kenneth Gibson*

S3M-3686 Jamie Hepburn: 20th Anniversary of Cumbernauld Action Care for the Elderly—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld Action Care for the Elderly (CACE) on reaching its 20th anniversary in 2009; recognises the important work that the organisation has carried out over the last two decades, supporting and encouraging the senior citizens of Cumbernauld to make the most of their later years; notes that official celebrations will mark the anniversary on 21 April in Cumbernauld Town Hall, and looks forward to many more years of dedicated service to the older people of Cumbernauld from CACE. Supported by: Cathie Craigie, Alasdair Allan, Aileen Campbell, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Hugh O’Donnell, Kenneth Gibson, Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3686 20th Anniversary of Cumbernauld Action Care for the Elderly (lodged on 11 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
